properties.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northwest Blue Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 8:43AM PST until February 14 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches.
Winds gusting as high as 30 mph.

* WHERE...In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. In Oregon,
Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially late
tonight into Friday morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY
